title.rendered: Briefly about Miami Swim Week 2021 and 24Fashion TV

content.rendered:
24Fashion TV had a very hot July this year in Miami when we were media sponsors of Miami Swim Week. Victoria Unikel, CEO, Galina Antonova, Editor in Chief, and Gene Avakyan, CTO, attended most of the events that week. All the runway video from the events is available on the 24Fashion TV channel on Roku TV and Amazon Fire TV.

The Art Hearts Fashion events were wonderfully produced and were loved by the audience gathered at the Faena Forum to witness the spectacle. What a show it was, too! The audience was left speechless by all the designers as well as the special shows put on by Black Tape Project, Adam Saaks, Camilla, Natalia Fedner, and MATTE. All in all, about 40 designers presented their work on the runway and the production staff had their hands full coordinating the dozens of models and designers to put on a wonderful show! Flying Solo also brought us the work of about 50 designers who dazzled with beautiful, colorful collections on an outdoor runway in the middle of Miami Beach.

The next amazing event we have to look forward to is the New York Fashion Week - NYFW 2021 here we come!

With love, 24Fashion co-founders

Editor-in Chief Galina Antonova, CEO Victoria Unikel

CEO Victoria Unikel, CTO Gene Avakyan
